website_summaries.verdict: For holding together pieces of a larger project, this multi-clamp set offers utility at a nice price. The bar clamp isn’t as strong or precise as toggle-control clamps, but it gets the job done.
pros: The main clamp’s lightweight utility for holding pieces and parts together is a big plus for most users
Others like having multiple spring-action clamps in the set
cons: Protective rubber feet tend to slip off
Reports of spring clamps failing under load
Bar clamp’s ratcheting action sacrifices precision, and some users find it holds too loosely

customer_reviews.title: I don't get it!
customer_reviews.text: I don't get the hype about this product. The high reviews here and you see them frequently on woodworking videos. Everybody seems to use them. I generally like Irwin products (comb. squares espec.) but these clamps are VERY mediocre. They are small, flimsy, and the jaws skew out of alignment with any serious pressure applied. If you need a very light duty one handed clamp, one that doesn't need to clamp overly tight, then OK but don't expect much. I have nearly 80 clamps in my shop. I won't be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Dwyatt

customer_reviews.title: These are a cheaper version of the Irwin Quick Clamps that I own
customer_reviews.text: These are made from cheaper and flimsier plastic than the other Irwin clamps that I own. I think these will break easily in use. In the attached picture, the older and more robust clamps that I have had for years are the ones on top with the yellow pads and the ones on the bottom are what you get with this set. They are less expensive so you may still want to buy them and risk the possibility of them breaking on you but I returned them the day after receiving them. I gave them 2 stars because they would probably work for a time.
customer_reviews.author: Sox Fan T

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally give five stars since few people (me included) read or believe them. I had to in this case though. These devices are not the standard "bargain bin" cheapos you see in the local Walmart. They are well made (at least mine are) and extremely versatile. I used one as a third hand to hold my bicycle brakes together while I adjusted them and their applications in woodworking are only limited by your imagination. The jaws won't mar the finish though I still place a buffer piece of scrap wood between them and the work piece. Haven't had any problems with them.
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Marold

customer_reviews.title: strong construction, made for "soft touch" like finese wood and holding things not too heavy.
customer_reviews.text: First day]: this clamp set looks awesome, trying each one i've seen a very good construction, hard plastic, very hard and strong plastic, i was worried about cheape chinese fabrication, but this not, spring loaded clamps are very powerful enough for rough tasks, larger clamps are "soft grip" but really this functionality does not armfull for finesse wood or something like that, good investment, i've read many bad reviews and goods as well, and let me tell you this is a medium tool for holding things not too heavy ( in other case use metal C clamps instead ), but the work they do it's very good.Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Yanan Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: I'll probably buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Love 6 of them, but had to subtract a star for the "Handi-Clamps." These little guys must be VERY job specific and I must have not found that job. They're pretty much worthless as I have not found a job that they work well at, yet. I pretty much just let my kids play with them when they're being my helpers. The bar clamps are perfect. The spring clamps are freakishly powerful. I'm a big dude and I can barely open those spring clamps all the way with one hand. Most people who try can barely do it with two. My kids can't open them with with 2 pair of hands.
customer_reviews.author: B. Setliff

customer_reviews.title: Great for odd jobs
customer_reviews.text: My husband complained when I bought it asking why I needed the clamps. He wanted me to buy just one 36 inch. Of course I did what I wanted. A few days after getting it in the mail I used to redo a dresser. I used 6 of them at once. Since then I have used it for several other projects. It was a great investment. I love the different sizes It's great for some of the odd projects such as gluing things back together. One size does not fit all.
customer_reviews.author: juno13

customer_reviews.title: Irwin Makes Good Clamps
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Irwin clamps for woodworking for quite a while and this set was a great deal. The only reason I have them 4 stars is because of the difficulty with the tension clamps that were included. It takes two hands to press hard enough to get these open; at least for me. If someone has extremely strong hands, these are too hard to use. I might have to find a permanent use for them holding something together, because they aren't of any use to me as woodworking clamps.
customer_reviews.author: SJ Holley

customer_reviews.title: Best Grip for the money
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these grips are incredible. You can tell that it is well made and not a flaw insight. Easy to use and very dependable. The flex are perfect not like others which were hard to operate. I used it when I built my garage shelf. I couldn't have done without the grips. So these are so vital for a weekend project.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great Medium Grade Clamps
customer_reviews.text: I recently started getting into woodworking and these clamps have been very helpful in the process. I'd recommend also grabbing some more heavy duty clams, but for the most part, you can never have enough clamps! The hand clamps haven't been used yet since they don't fit on a 2x4, but I'm sure I'll find a use for them soon.
customer_reviews.author: Brennan Giuffre

customer_reviews.title: One hand use!!!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my projects. They are not as rugged as the pro version, but these are durable enough to get the job done. Initially when I ordered these, I needed more clamps for a canoe restoration project. Once I started working, it was obvious the 8 clamps I already owned were not sufficient. It was great to pick up this pack for a fair price. All of these clamps are useable with only one hand, and this is what makes them so helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy L.

customer_reviews.title: Opened product and corrupted product
customer_reviews.text: Package came damaged and incomplete. Someone opened this and switch the big clamp for a small one. Terrible condition, totally disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Gansita

customer_reviews.title: Missing the 12 inches clamps
customer_reviews.text: I like the clamps, but the package states it contains 2 - 6" mini one-handed bar clamps and 2-12" mini one-handed bar clamps. I received 4 of the 6" mini one-handed clamps and 0 of the 12" clamps. Pretty strange because the package itself even says 12" mini one-handed bar clamps. A bit disappointing really.
customer_reviews.author: B. Gunderson

customer_reviews.title: Great clamps for new comers
customer_reviews.text: These are great for people who are first getting into woodworking, that's all I use them for, and I use them every day in my shop. This set has everything you need to get started and has everything you need for smaller projects. They've held up really well even after all of the abuse I've put them through.
customer_reviews.author: Leedo

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I have used these clamps a few times now with no issue. I don’t understand what other reviewers are dissatisfied with. They do what they are intended to do every time I have needed them. Treat your tools right and they will last.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Strong and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: A great set of universal clamps! These are just soooo useful! Strong versatile and easy to use. They truly are like having several helpful hands. I couldn’t get things done without these.
customer_reviews.author: Sohala

customer_reviews.title: You NEED These
customer_reviews.text: We'll keep this short. This Irwin Quick-Grip Set of 8 clamps, is nothing short of a 'Boon to Mankind.' Find a place of prominence on one of your pegboards in your 'Man Cave'. You'll be using them and, glad you have them. Yea...I gave them 5 stars. Super handy! They provide a powerful grip. Easy to release. And, well worth the money. End 'O Story....
customer_reviews.author: Capt. G.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Decided to get these due to the good price. Once I ordered, I got concerned that the clamps would be very small. Hard to tell how big the clamp will be with a 6 inch bar. I was very happy to see they were large and all looked great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Van Beek

customer_reviews.title: Solid, work, very durable.  As good as any I've seen and used.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this exact clamp set for years, and they're solid, easy to use, and very versatile. I bought another for my Brother-in-law as his are cheap knockoffs and fail repeatedly. They're clamps - not rocket science. They work, they hold up (10 years now) and i cannot recommend them enough.
customer_reviews.author: S. Harbin

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money as a starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, the smallest two are very useful for me, but others are great. A good starter kit but soon you will find out you need longer ones.
customer_reviews.author: T Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great for quick projects!
customer_reviews.text: Have used on many projects to keep things together. Can be a bit difficult to get to grip tightly, feels like the mechanism is a bit 'squishy.' Would recommend for quick projects that don't require extensive use.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Two broken within 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Both the single hand clamps have broken. They have a cheap plastic piece that breaks. Terrible quality. Shame on Irwin for selling these.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: Nice clamps
customer_reviews.text: A nice set of clamps for my wood working, the spring clamps are pretty stiff. Digging the ratcheting clamps, wish they opened a little wider.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Addleton

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I have other Irwin quick clamps that I have used for many years. They aren't the kind of thing you use for glue-ups in woodworking, but these are all perfect for a quick hold when you need it (for sawing, drilling, sanding, etc.). I love these clamps and this pack is a great value. I would buy this again and I think this pack is a great bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Item.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our son who does woodworking and cabinet making. They are amazing. Worked great and easy to use. Appear that they will hold up well over time.
customer_reviews.author: JLN

customer_reviews.title: Latest gift for my woodworker son
customer_reviews.text: I told my son, one thing you will never have enough of, is clamps. Very quickly he learned, after borrowing several of mine, so the least I could do was to get him a starter set and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great as easy to use clamps. I bought these as I broke one I have had for few years when I dropped a project I was working on. They come in handy for so many things, I bought this bigger pack with different clamps to help with more projects. Every shop or garage should have these.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Man

customer_reviews.title: Questionable
customer_reviews.text: Used clamp from set for first time to mend kitchen cutting board and it broke, without being abused! Will never purchase one of their products, again.
customer_reviews.author: Peer Review

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: When you dont have an extra set of hands these clamps helped me out quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Photo Memories

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: These are light duty but can't beat the price. I went to Lowe's first and could only get one clamp for this price.
customer_reviews.author: derek rusin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My husband was working on a project and needed this to hold in place while drying. Worked perfectly and project a success.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Used on flooring project to clamp planks for cutting. Did the job easily. Will use again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Austin

customer_reviews.title: Do you have eight hands? No? Then buy this.
customer_reviews.text: If you are trying to fix something or build something, inevitably you have to grip things together. If you have eight hands then you don't need this product. If you have less than eight hands, then you do.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Warwick

customer_reviews.title: metal c clamps hold much better
customer_reviews.text: easy to use but no graduation of tightness , great with c clamps if nothing else is available.
customer_reviews.author: N. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the assorted clamps
customer_reviews.text: I like the clamps, have used them numerous times and I'm happy with the clamping power in each device.
customer_reviews.author: Thorne

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They work well and they are easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Trulyvangasmic

customer_reviews.title: I'd much rather have two more bar clamps - the spring clamps aren't as useful to me
customer_reviews.text: Item description is wrong, picture is right. I've brought this to Amazon's attention, but they haven't fixed it yet. Contains two 6" bar clamps, two 12" bar clamps, and two each of two different spring clamps. I'd much rather have two more bar clamps - the spring clamps aren't as useful to me.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: I have never had clamps like these before. They are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, should be reversible
customer_reviews.text: They are great, but not reversible. Only thing keeping it from a perfect score
customer_reviews.author: Thomas K. Horeis

customer_reviews.title: great mix
customer_reviews.text: great mix of handy clamps that are not heavy and bulky--good for small/light jobs
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: great deal at $29.99
customer_reviews.text: dont buy these please so they keep the price low so when i can afford another set i will buy two.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great Clamps
customer_reviews.text: Greeeeeat clamps! So simple and easy to use. They’re a breeze to work with one handed in a tight space. They can’t provide the strength of a pipe clamp, but they’re perfect for their intended use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For lightweight work only
customer_reviews.text: These are lightweight clamps. If you need clamps for installing kitchen cabinets or similarly precise and heavy work, order the heavy duty version. I have both and the heavy duty clamps are MUCH stronger and worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: A. Emery

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: I have been making some note pads and these work perfect to keep them tight while the glue drys. My favorite thing is they are easy for me to use as a female! Others were more complicated. I also liked the set because it had everything I needed. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: REVIEWER

customer_reviews.title: There's a reason these are rarely in stock
customer_reviews.text: Great assortment of light duty clamps at a great price. Update- Downgraded from five to four stars after one of the spring clamps 'sploded three hours into a glue-up. Update II- Dropped another star. The faces of the bar clamps are not parallel making it difficult to keep glue-ups aligned. As you tighten them the bar end comes into parallel and pushes the surface it's on up. I've struggled too many times to continue to just let it go. Update III- I hate these clamps.
customer_reviews.author: MARKRP

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, very well engineered for great function and ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality product, clearly these clamps have been incrementally improved over time because the design, function and ease of use is worthy of 6 stars. The clamp has thick rubber teeth, the tightening/locking mechanism is smooth.. just pump the grip and it tightens flawlessly. Releasing is just as smooth, a separate handle press and the device loosens just enough to unlock but not too much that the grip comes completely off whatever you are clamping.
customer_reviews.author: Nick G

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? Irwin quality at an off-brand price. 35.00 for an 8 piece clamp set. Retail of the bar clamps alone is worth more than that. Excellent set of tools. I can't wait to put them to work.
customer_reviews.author: ReptilerickTwitch

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: Doing a shed project on my own and having these set of clamps really made the day go by allot easier. Its like having two extra helpers but with clamps. So far no issues!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: They CLAMP without breaking!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong with Irwin clamps, the cheapies are exactly that, But IRWIN is not cheaply made and they hold up forever!
customer_reviews.author: John Vargason

customer_reviews.title: Best clamps around
customer_reviews.text: I grew up seeing my mom use these in her shop. Still the best clamps around. Strong, durable, and work great.
customer_reviews.author: Sammyboy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for light to medium duty use
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect light to medium duty clamps. They clamp set is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Willox

customer_reviews.title: perfect for what i needed
customer_reviews.text: I'm an entry level DIY'er and these have been handy for a few projects. Having so many different sizes/styles has been really helpful. I would definitely recommend these
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: He loved gift
customer_reviews.text: Got them as a gift. He loved the gift. Only reason I could not 0ut higher is because I can not say how they worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift but seem to be of good quality
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Todd

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a starter set because I am new to woodworking and lacked tools. Can't go wrong with buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. E

customer_reviews.title: Best clamps and great deal.
customer_reviews.text: This clamps are invaluable. My husband uses them so often and it is like having an extra set of hands. I got this set for my daughters boyfriend to start him off with some useful tools to fill his tool box.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Most used tool I own
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is I wish I had more and that's my own problem. These are the most used items in my woodworking room. I regularly use them to clamp pieces to glue up and screw in pocket screws.
customer_reviews.author: deanna lyne oliva

customer_reviews.title: They’re Irwin...NuffSaid
customer_reviews.text: Buy these and next time you go to Lowe’s, you’ll go OH!
customer_reviews.author: PahPaw

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great clamp set for the workshop! Easy to adjust and never let's go until you release them. The smaller spring loaded ones have tons of clamping power.
customer_reviews.author: Banora

customer_reviews.title: Work great. Seem like they may not be durable.
customer_reviews.text: The slip and grip mechanisms work fine. You do get the sense they aren't durable but I haven't broken one yet and I am using them frequently. We'll see how they hold up when I start welding my ATV fenders!
customer_reviews.author: TKH

customer_reviews.title: Easily used 1 handed and to adjust!
customer_reviews.text: Switched to these from the "old school" clamps my grandfather gave me, sorry grandpa! So much easier and faster to use, no more round clamp marks on the wood. The spring clamps are strong clamping and just right for gluing split wood and small items together, no over squeeze. Would recommend to everyone and will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: ldy

customer_reviews.title: Great clamps
customer_reviews.text: Great clamps!! I use them for guitar repair. Great assortment of sizes to help get any job done. So far, they also haven't left a single mark on a guitar's finish.
customer_reviews.author: kyldh

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: These guys are a lot better than the cheapy Harbor Freight ones I got
customer_reviews.author: Chris L.

customer_reviews.title: useful
customer_reviews.text: Used these to build this fence by myself. Very very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Cory soto

customer_reviews.title: Work great, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter set of clamps. Many uses around the house or shop. They don't clamp with tremendous force, but enough for the usual holding things down/together and cutting boards.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Expectations met
customer_reviews.text: Not much to complain about. Basic set of clamps that do exactly what I’d expect them to do.
customer_reviews.author: AJw15

customer_reviews.title: Great set of Clamps
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these grips for my husband's birthday gift. Had to give them early because we were trying to make a photo frame collage and realized we needed clamps to hold the frames together. The Irwin Quick-Grip Clamp set was a life saver. Worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Va

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent clamps. Although this model has been replaced by Irwin’s newer design i prefer this one. The rounded hand grips on these clamps are far more comfortable than the new square ones.
customer_reviews.author: The Review

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic clamps. Super easy to clamp / unclamp
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic clamps. Super easy to clamp / unclamp. They hold very securely. I use them daily on my workbench and have no complaints. Will be ordering more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher h41p1N

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good set for small projects, one of the larger ones broke and Irwin sent me a replacement. That makes me a loyal customer!
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: It certainly helped in my many wood working projects. Able to operate with one hand while holding the work.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Charles R. Eyles

customer_reviews.title: This package deal is hard to find in stores, its a great deal
customer_reviews.text: These clamps work well, and if purchased individually cost allot more than the packaged deal.
customer_reviews.author: Shane R.

customer_reviews.title: No hesitation, wonderful set of clamps
customer_reviews.text: This set is very handy, cover many applications and tight spaces, durable material, high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Mahmoud H.

customer_reviews.title: They're easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This variety pack is very practical and the sizes of the clamps come in very handy. They're easy to use, nice and simple design and they have held very nicely and strong so far...
customer_reviews.author: RTS

customer_reviews.title: Im impressed
customer_reviews.text: Great value. I was skeptical about the bar clamps, but they grip tight and work great! A must for any well outfitted home workshop
customer_reviews.author: specialguest

customer_reviews.title: I just wish I could afford more of these.
customer_reviews.text: You can never have too many clamps. Only "draw back" is that these smaller bar clamps do not allow you to reverse the heads to use as spreaders the way that you can on the 24 inch and longer clamps.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes Jones

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of clamps at great price. Been using these clamps for a few small projects and they very easy to work with and have an amazing grip. You get 8 clamps for the same price other people are charging for 4.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these clamps. They're very handy and fairly tough. I did manage to break one of them after a year of heavy use. But for the price I went ahead and purchased another set.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Walker

customer_reviews.title: Irwin Quick-Grip Clamp Set
customer_reviews.text: These Quick-Grip tools were just the ticket for repairing a few new redwood fence boards that began to split and needed to be glued intact. As the description indicates--- quick and effortless.
customer_reviews.author: CSGutz

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on clamps
customer_reviews.text: Absolute great deal. The quality of these clamps speak for themselves but the deal is what's up.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Super handy
customer_reviews.text: Go to clamps for me for several years. Sturdy and easy to use on a variety of projects and crafts. My wife uses the to stretch material too! Everyone should have a few around.
customer_reviews.author: Erik R. Swierk

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I think Irwin clamps are the best for the money, and this set is a great buy. Two each of the 4 most used clamps. A woodshop can never have too many clamps and this is the best way to build up your stock.
customer_reviews.author: Walter L. Wien

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Good price and cheaper than what you get in the store seem to work well but I would not want to put a lot of extra presser on them.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Not for small scale model assembly.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I bought them for clamping models together while gluing. They're quite large so not great for small scale projects but this is an awesome value set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for your woodshop
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how I got along this far without these
customer_reviews.author: Billy Albritton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best quick clamps I've used... even compared to ones that cost twice as much.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Tchochiev

customer_reviews.title: Need these
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of clamps that work great. I used them to clamp my AR to the kitchen table so I could torque the barrel on.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Absolute rubbish
customer_reviews.text: The claps don't provide a strong grip and keeps sliding along the joints if wood is held vertically. I have bought numerous product on amazon and this is the first time that I'm compelled to write a review. Don't buy this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this set of quick-grip clamps covers several small scale projects that many of them find useful. The clamps themselves provide e
customer_reviews.text: Using these in a woodshop for beginning wood-workers, this set of quick-grip clamps covers several small scale projects that many of them find useful. The clamps themselves provide enough pressure to ensure that parts are held in place for long durations. Good and versatile for its purposes.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Third hand
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of clamps! I wish I’d gotten them years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Dog lover

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Kit
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to stop by and say this was an excellent set of clamps. I am a casual user, so I am not doing anything heavy (so I can't comment on that), but for my use, the many clamps in this kit take care of all of my needs. I am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lenz

customer_reviews.title: Great name brand u can count on as always.
customer_reviews.text: Irwin never fails. Awesome clamps. I like the different selection in this combo pack. If you can’t clamp it with this package it don’t need clamping. Also 1/2 the price as in store.
customer_reviews.author: Buck lane

customer_reviews.title: Great help in the shop.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite part of these very usefull clamps is that they somehow avoided bastardizing the spelling to seem unique.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Oswald

customer_reviews.title: best set of clamps for composite or wood working
customer_reviews.text: awesome wood or composite work clamps, great variety; must have addition
customer_reviews.author: NL

customer_reviews.title: No idea why these are sold, they don't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: For me, these are junk. They don't hold anything. Just a little pressure is enough to loosen them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner123

customer_reviews.title: Give him the Clamps, Clamps!
customer_reviews.text: This set of clamps is a great value. I have made good use of all 8 clamps. I've never met anyone with enough clamps.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S

customer_reviews.title: Love these, couldn't work without them
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm and the whole set has a real good, strong grip.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Bar clamps are great and the others surprisingly sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Don't know how I got by without them before. The bar clamps are fantastic. I was a little skeptical about the "handi-clamps" and spring clamps but have actually found uses for both and they seem quite sturdy. Good stuff.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Great value for several useful peices rather than buying the pieces separately. Excellent quality.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: One of the clamps came broken, contacted Erwin, no response Will not buy from them in the future

customer_reviews.title: ... used the smaller grips so far but they were excellent. The other grips look ideal for larger jobs
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the smaller grips so far but they were excellent. The other grips look ideal for larger jobs.

product_meta.title: IRWIN QUICK-GRIP Clamps Set, 8-Piece (IRHT83220) & QUICK-GRIP Clamps, One-Handed, Mini Bar, 6-Inch, 4-Pack (1964758)
product_meta.description:
Style:8-Piece Clamp Set| Pattern Name:Clamps Set + Clamps, 4-PackIRWIN QUICK-GRIP Clamps Set, 8-Piece (IRHT83220)
IRWIN QUICK-GRIP clamps offer the right fit, features and pressure for any clamping job – from the smallest craft project to large scale cabinetry. Whether you need the convenience and power of the QUICK-GRIP Heavy-Duty One-Handed Bar Clamp or the versatility of the Medium-Duty clamp, you can be sure you will get the clamping performance you need.

IRWIN QUICK-GRIP Clamps, One-Handed, Mini Bar, 6-Inch, 4-Pack (1964758)
The IRWIN(r) QUICK-GRIP(R) One-Handed Mini Bar Clamp 4 Pack, is the perfect clamp set for smaller projects and working in confined spaces. Reinforced resin bodies and hardened steel bars ensure strength and durability. These clamps feature non-marring pads to protect work surfaces, one-handed quick-release triggers and provide 140 lbs. of clamping force. Set includes four 6" One-Handed Mini Bar Clamps.
feature_bullets: Product 1: Mini Bar clamps exert up to 150 psi. of clamping pressure
Product 1: Handi-Clamps feature QUICK-RELEASE triggers for fast and easy positioning
Product 1: All clamps constructed of high-tech reinforced resin for strength and durability
Product 1: Backed by the IRWIN Lifetime
Product 2: NON-MARRING PADS: Grip firmly and protect your workpiece from scratches and scuffs
Product 2: QUICK-GRIP DESIGN: One-handed triggers release the clamps instantly
Product 2: STURDY: Resin construction with hardened steel bars to prevent flexing and bending
Product 2: 140LBS of force: Keep your workpiece together and evenly distribute 150LBS. of force
